reviewText: Well, if you are looking for some serious gambling card tricks... this isn't the right video. However, it is really hilarious with many random scenes that pops up. A art of Stephen Chow's performance. He does live up  to his title of being the "king of comedy". The plot is actually  very complicated with many outrageous snags. I enjoyed it if nothing else  more than the laugh. This is actually part 2b or 3b in the series.
